thag2.16:5.1: There’s a big black woman who looks like a crow.
thag2.16:5.2: She broke off thigh-bones, first one then another;
thag2.16:5.3: she broke off arm-bones, first one then another;
thag2.16:5.4: she broke off a skull like a curd-bowl, and then
thag2.16:6.1: When an ignorant person builds up attachments,
thag2.16:6.2: that idiot returns to suffering again and again.
thag2.16:6.3: So let one who understands not build up attachments:
thag2.16:6.4: may I never again lie with a broken skull!
